title: ReadME Generator
about: Sick of making ReadMe after ReadMe after ReadMe? Same. Use this applications to generate a Readme easily.

title: Idk, You Pick
about: Have you ever asked someone what they want to watch or eat and they say 'IDK, you pick'? Well now you can swing by IDK, You Pick and get a randomly generated movie or meal depending on your preferences!

title: Ho[w]asit
about: Sick of not know who can trust when looking for a good movie or show to watch? With Ho[w]asit you can create your own personal reviews, or get reviews from other individuals or groups your follow
